Instructions: Using the provided web search results, write a comprehensive reply to the given prompt. Make sure to cite results using [[number](URL)] notation after the reference. If the provided search results refer to multiple subjects with the same name, write separate answers for each subject.
Prompt: find job position delphi in thailand

According to the provided web search results, there are currently multiple job opportunities for Delphi programmers and developers in Thailand as of January 2023.
[[1](https://th.jooble.org/jobs-delphi-programmer/Thailand)] states that there are 824 current vacancies for Delphi programmer jobs in Thailand on the website jooble. Additionally, [[2](https://my.jooble.org/jobs-delphi-developer/Thailand)] states that there are a variety of Delphi developer jobs available in Thailand, with verified employers and an easy application process. [[3](https://th.jobsdb.com/th/search-jobs/delphi/1)] also lists several Delphi job opportunities in Thailand on the website JobsDB. It's worth noting that some of these jobs may require additional skills such as marketing, communication, or data analysis.
